title: Number Slayers
description: An educational math game built with Three.js featuring immersive 3D graphics and engaging gameplay mechanics designed to make learning math fun and interactive.

title: 2D Pong Game
description: A classic Pong game reimagined with modern web technologies, featuring smooth animations, responsive controls, and customizable gameplay settings.

title: TimelyCare
description: A comprehensive telehealth platform providing mental health and medical services to university students across the nation, built with accessibility as a core priority.
